headline.print_headline: Sanofi Recalls Drug Injectors Used to Treat Allergic Reactions
headline.main: Sanofi Recalls Drug Injectors Used to Treat Allergic Reactions

snippet: Sanofi is recalling hundreds of thousands of epinephrine injectors used to treat severe allergic reactions because they may not deliver the correct amount of the drug.
abstract: Sanofi announces recall of around 490,000 Auvi-Q epinephrine injectors over concerns they may not provide appropriate amount of drug to address severe allergic reactions.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi is recalling hundreds of thousands of epinephrine injectors used to treat severe allergic reactions because they may not deliver the correct amount of the drug.
